players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Alice was found dead last night, so we lost a player already. We need to be careful and watch for suspicious behavior. Does anyone have any thoughts or observations?"
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out to keep the town safe."
Diana: "Bob has been silent and hasn't denied the accusation. This is suspicious and only confirms my investigation. We should vote to arrest Bob now before he harms anyone else."
